en.name: Unfinished Reverie
en.4p: After leaving combat for 3s, DMG dealt increased by 50%. In combat, if no Burning opponents are nearby for more than 6s, this DMG Bonus will decrease by 10% per second until it reaches 0%. When a Burning opponent exists, it will increase by 10% instead until it reaches 50%. This effect still triggers if the equipping character is off-field.

zh.name: 未竟的遐思
zh.4p: 脱离战斗状态3秒后，造成的伤害提升50%。在战斗状态下，附近不存在处于燃烧状态下的敌人超过6秒后，上述伤害提升效果每秒降低10%，直到降低至0%；存在处于燃烧状态下的敌人时，每秒提升10%，直到达到50%。装备此圣遗物套装的角色处于队伍后台时，依然会触发该效果。
